Name: uniqueness
Description: Uniqueness identifier differentiating systems which are simple crystal symmetries in a biounit

Name: biounit_num_ligands
Description: Number of ligands within systems in the biounit

Name: biounit_num_unique_ccd_codes
Description: Number of unique CCD codes within systems in the biounit

Name: biounit_num_proper_ligands
Description: Number of proper ligands within systems in the biounit

Name: system_ligand_has_lipinski
Description: Whether the system has a lipinski ligand

Name: system_ligand_has_cofactor
Description: Whether the system has a cofactor ligand

Name: system_ligand_has_fragment
Description: Whether the system has a fragment ligand

Name: system_ligand_has_oligo
Description: Whether the system has an oligomer ligand

Name: system_ligand_has_artifact
Description: Whether the system has an artifact ligand

Name: system_ligand_has_other
Description: Whether the system has a ligand labelled as other

Name: system_ligand_has_covalent
Description: Whether the system has a covalent ligand

Name: system_ligand_has_invalid
Description: Whether the system has an invalid ligand

Name: system_ligand_has_ion
Description: Whether the system has an ion

Name: system_protein_chains_total_length
Description: Total length of all protein chains in the system

Name: system_unique_ccd_codes
Description: Unique CCD codes in the system

Name: system_proper_unique_ccd_codes
Description: Unique CCD codes of proper ligands in the system

Name: entry_pass_validation_criteria
Description: Whether the entry passes crystal validation criteria

Name: system_pass_validation_criteria
Description: Whether the system passes crystal validation criteria

Name: ligand_interactions
Description: Interactions of the ligand

Name: ligand_auth_id
Description: Author chain ID of the ligand
